page.title: 11THE RURAL DOCTOR
page.content: THE LOCAL DOCTOR WORKS IN A GROUP PRACTICE SURGERY IN ATTLEBOROUGH. THE DOCTOR GETS UP AT{7 A.M}.HE GOES TO WORK AT 8 A.M.FROM ABOUT{8 A.M.}TO { 11 A.M}HE SEES ILL PEOPLE IN THE SURGERY.FROM{11 A.M.}TO{HALF PAST 11 THE DOCTOR WRITES LETTERS AND DICTATES THEM.THEN HE DOES HIS ROUNDS. AT ABOUT{HALF PAST 12}HE GOES HOME FOR HIS LUNCH.AT{2 P.M.}HE GOES EITHER TO WAYLAND HOSPITAL OR A CLINC.LATER AT THE SURGERY HE SEES SOME MORE ILL PEOPLE.HE GOES HOME AT ABOUT{7 P.M.}BUT SOMETIMES HE HAS TO STAY LATE BECAUSE DOCTORS ARE OFTEN ASKED TO BE ON COMMITTIES AND GO TO MEETINGS.SOMETIMES HE GIVES BABIES THEIR INJECTIONS.HE INJECTS THEM AGAINST POLIO ,MEASLES,DIPTHERIA, WHOOPING COUGH,TETANUS,TYPHUS.
